stem: Given question: What place could have one back garden? and answer: house, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Unlike apartments or most condominiums, larger houses are likely to have yards behind the house, and these yards are likely to have gardens (i.e., "back" gardens).
150_to_200_words:
A house can have one back garden because a back garden is a part of the house. The house and the back garden, when combined, make a complete living space. A back garden offers a wide range of benefits to the house, such as providing fresh air, improving the aesthetic of the house, creating a private area for family members to relax and enjoy, and providing a space for gardening activities. The garden also adds to the overall value of the house and can be a great place for entertaining guests.

Besides these benefits, a back garden can also be used to grow vegetables, fruits, and herbs. This can provide an additional source of food for the family and can also be an enjoyable activity for everyone. Moreover, a back garden is also a great place for outdoor activities such as barbecuing, playing games, and even hosting parties.

Overall, a house can have one back garden because it offers a lot of benefits and can be a great addition to any house. It can provide a great source of relaxation and entertainment, while also helping to improve the look and value of the house.
